New Records: Harry Brook moved past Virat Kohli for the most runs by a captain in an ODI series against Australia; 312 to Kohli’s 310 in 2019.
Key Match Events: Ben Duckett scored 107 runs off 91 balls.
Harry Brook scored 72 runs off 52 balls.
Travis Head took four wickets for 28 runs, his career-best ODI figures.
Matthew Short scored 50 runs off 30 balls.
England collapsed from 202-2 to 309 all out.
Australia won by 49 runs (DLS) after rain interrupted the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Mitch Marsh, Australia's stand-in captain, expressed respect for England and noted the series was played in a good manner.
Harry Brook claimed he had now discovered his tempo in 50-over cricket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, leading to a DLS result.
Adil Rashid scored 36 runs off 35 balls, his highest ODI score in seven years.
The match saw delays due to a mandatory drinks break and a change of boots for Matthew Potts.
